MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH3 and EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Saunders Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:49AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:09 AM on Saturday, 20 February 2021
